Blog.post: after a time of confession and all that...i figured out nothing out of nothing..i donno what crap am i talking about though.but however sucky life can be,i still have to go on coz Jesus haven't want me to go back HOME yet...how i wish i can go HOMe soon...i wish that things will turn out fine in many many many many areas in my life.sigh...but still i've to strive. TALKING about striving...my strive on fasting and praying fervently haven't been a success..so i'm gonna go now.still my fast on my hp will go on in a right way coz i finished my credit!how smart...muahhahahahahahahaha... :-3 areas of worries in my life... Receding my KH exam tomoro(and i haven't study yet.how great is that??)! PMR results....dang my spiritual life. sigh sigh sigh...dowana sigh and complain edi lar...BYE BYE!!!!

hey diary...feel kinda touched by my friend annora..she knows i'm an attention craver..this friend of mine and another friend of mine named philee also..they both really love me and knows that i'm an attention craver...it jez sux u know..i don't know why am i this person who wants attention so much..ppl label me as "problem free","jovial","happy","outgoing" and all that crap..i don't know lar..i'm not.i'm jez a plain old crazy gurl who wants attention and man,i knoiw why these stuff happens.i know why i want attention so much.. i dunno lar...ppl jez stood by me but somehow i'm this selfish gurl..why am i like this??i question this for so many many times.sometimes when i see myself and i wonder i can jez cry for no reason...man i feel so...selfish.. the reason why i crave for attention so much is because of my past childhood experience.i was rejected,hated and sometimes even scolded..WHY??i was jez a little gurl!!ppl don't like me because of my size!of my maturity...sometimes. and sometimes when i question them about certain things,they tend to look at me like i'm an alien and scold me.thanks to mr.egoistic....and my pride,my perfectionist attitude is built by them!!!i don't know why the heck am i still living in hurt..i know Jesus is here for me.i know and i acknowledge that but WHY when i was YOUNG!!???i was just a gurl...i don't know a thing.... neways..nuff sed bout the anger...ciaoz
i'm all gurly now!!lolz...look at muh site..rosy pink ewwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwww

urlLink http://www,xanga.com/justinezlife_jeffnie . that's muh site name..i mean public site..dis is muh private site with all muh feeling...s..hehehe i missed bloggin so much so much but i hav to go...i'm jez dis stoopid gurl...aihz gonna go recede for exams..damn..fyne fyne..stressed like crazy few days back..now not really having rest but iz ok...hav to learn to cope with things in my life.ok blog, i zhou xian..buh bye!!!
hello..today kinda sux bcoz tomoro is trials..but i leave the rest to the Lord.jez wanna remind myself here dat i'm under God's provision..His care and i love Him so much. TRIALS TOMORO.full stop.

i don't know lar...i jez felt sad coz life has been super funny nowadays...me and ann..not as close as b4..maybe it's me being too sensitive,but if u're reading this,ann..i really don't know why we're like this..any ideas?i feel super super super super down sometimes thinking of our friendship.. i don't wanna b a babbling bitch here...leave me probz to God..:) but it's nvr easy man...it's never easy....

man..going out with ann for about a few hours..i'm beat.headaches.damn.i hate sch..it's tomoro.sux..i need to study tonite jez for that damn geography!!and some other damn fuking subs...i'm so tired..ciaoz
hey i'm in annora's place now..typing this blog keke..she's currently watching honey.probably gonna go carrefour later..gonna go study now!will b keeping pr glenn in prayer. ciaoz ciaoz...

Lord, i commit pastor glenn and his team that they will be blessed people..in Jesus name i commit all the events,the schedule for the events and the people involved that LORd you are gonna bless this team like never before.You take care of the team Lord.I ask of Your grace and mercy to be renewed each day just for them Lord.enrich them from strength to strength..bless them from day to day Lord.uphold them Lord and increase their dependance on You.i command all unwanted spirits to leave..and may the Holy Spirit fill the place wherever they are right now..prepare their hearts for the unexpected and prepare the people's hearts who will attend their event.bless them in Jesus name AMEN!! *declare with me " out of my spirit,will flow rivers of living waters,out of my soul will flow the enthusiasm for Christ,out of my flesh will flow the strength of Christ in me and out of myself,i will declare that Jesus reigns!!AMEN!
too crazy on blogspot.don't blame me.

U know what?I am feeling so great..coz I have great friends all around me..annora,if you're reading this,I'm glad u are my friend!you,philee,jacq,nadiah..u guys are my life!!mind you,you guys impacted my life like nobd's bzness...i love all of you!!and I have blessings from God to have such friends like you people..!!and also..ah pah!!thanks loads..for the time..;) love all of you so dearly!!

i really don't wanna see one teacher..this teacher is SUPER SUCKY!!loves to hentam me and muh fren annora..!!!!budden she's one nice teacher sumtimes..she's somewhat mean..but nice osolarr..aihzz..watever..
